text:
LSF Design | Multiple positions, Contract to start | North Chelmsford, MA | Onsite/Remote https://lsfdesign.com

LSF is a hardware / firmware / low-level-SW development house that specializes in embedded and scientific designs. We provide board, FPGA, SOC, DSP and micro controller based designs to our clients.

Open positions:

• Board Designer, analog and digital design, schematic capture, mechanical, layout experience a plus. Mentor tools 

• FPGA Designer. Intel, Xilinx experience, Verilog, VHDL req. Design Verification experience helpful.

• Linux / RTOS Coder. OS for SOC systems (varies). Strong C/C++ Embedded and DSP systems experience req.

Email to jobs@lsfdesign.com
